title: Drawing, "Frame for papal inscription"
markings: Verso: Cooper Union Museum for the Arts of Decoration (Lugt#457e)
provenance: Ex collection: Piancastelli and Mrs. Edward D. Brandegee.
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors and from Eleanor G. Hewitt Fund
description: Vertical rectangle. Above: an escutcheon framed by flower stems and above by the crossed papal keys. On top the tiara. Below, at left: a sketch for a flower stem. At right: section of the staircase of a terrace with a square in which the artist wrote the first word of the caption: "Lapide da Collocarsi in/ Albano nella Villa di Suo E[ccellen]za il P[rinci]pe D[on]/ Emilio Altieri per il Papa".

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Frame for papal inscription".
Pen and brown ink. Museum purchase through gift of various donors and from Eleanor G. Hewitt Fund. 1938-88-1835.
